article_title: Loudermilk fights off challengers during debate
article_text:
Canton, GA (30114)

Today

Some sun this morning with increasing clouds this afternoon. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 83F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Some clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 64F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

og.description: U.S. Rep. Barry Loudermilk, R-Cassville, fended off attacks from his four Republican challengers Monday night at a debate at the historic white marble courthouse in downtown Canton.
